```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec = rest_inspec |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  drop_na() |>
  filter(boro == "Manhattan") |>
  mutate(inspection_date = as.Date(inspection_date))
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
monthly_score = rest_inspec |>
  mutate(month = floor_date(inspection_date, "month")) |>
  group_by(month) |>
  summarize(mean_score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE), inspections = n(), .groups = "drop")

p1 = plot_ly(
  monthly_score,
  x = ~month,
  y = ~mean_score,
  type = "scatter",
  mode = "lines+markers",
  hoverinfo = "text",
  text = ~paste("Month:", month, "<br>Mean score:", round(mean_score,1), "<br>Inspections:", inspections)
) |>
  layout(title = "Average inspection score by month",
         xaxis = list(title = "Month"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Mean score"))
p1
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
grade_counts = rest_inspec |>
  mutate(grade = ifelse(is.na(grade) | grade == "", "Unknown", grade)) |>
  group_by(grade) |>
  summarize(count = n(), .groups = "drop") |>
  arrange(desc(count))

p2 = plot_ly(
  grade_counts,
  x = ~grade,
  y = ~count,
  type = "bar",
  text = ~count,
  textposition = "auto"
) |>
  layout(title = "Number of inspections by grade",
         xaxis = list(title = "Grade"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Count"))
p2
```

### Chart C

```{r}
p3 = plot_ly(
  rest_inspec,
  x = ~critical_flag,
  y = ~score,
  type = "box",
  boxpoints = "all",      # show all points
  jitter = 0.3,
  pointpos = -1.8,
  hoverinfo = "text",
  text = ~paste("Score:", score, "<br>Date:", inspection_date, "<br>Violation code:", violation_code)
) |>
  layout(title = "Score distribution by critical violation flag (Y/N)",
         xaxis = list(title = "Critical violation (Y/N)"),
         yaxis = list(title = "Score"))
p3

```
